Sentence: While we did not address the question whether the SAM domain of mr - s forms a polymeric structure in the present study, the phylogenetic analysis of SAM domain of mr - s and other SAM domain - containing molecules suggests that mr - s can form head - to - tail polymer and mediate gene silencing by spreading repressive complexes along the chromatin similar to ph and / or TEL.
